root.name: Bud Tucker in Double Trouble
root.description: Bud Tucker is a pizza delivery boy that works a night job as a lab assistant. One night, the professor and his cloning machine are stolen by the evil Dick Tate and Bud Tucker must put a stop to his evil plans before Dick Tate creates an army of evil clones. The game stars Michael Neill as the voice of Bud Tucker, George Roubicek as the Professor, Rik Mayall as the voice of Dick Tate, and Jules Dejongh as Lola.
